Danil, good evening. We apologize for this situation. If the behavior of our colleagues was similar to the one you described above, this, of course, is unacceptable. We will conduct a conversation with the staff and find out what could surprise them so that such situations never happen again.

Regarding the straws, you were a little mistaken, in the bar we do not use plastic ones. For a year now we have been working with https://www.yesstraws.com.ua/ (Ukrainian brand that produces ecological straw and wheat canes).
